verbose_text: At present, sorafenib, a multi-kinase inhibitor that inhibits Raf-1, B-Raf, vascular endothelial growth factor receptors, and platelet growth factor receptor, is the only systemic therapy that has demonstrated an overall survival benefit in patients with advanced HCC XREF_BIBR.
evidence: multi-kinase inhibitor that inhibits Raf-1, B-Raf
